channel.title: CVE Feed for Bareos GmbH & Co. KG -- all

item.title: CVE-2020-11061|2024-08-04T11:21:14.507Z -- bareos%20gmbh%20%26%20co.%20kg -- bareos%20director
item.description: In Bareos Director less than or equal to 16.2.10, 17.2.9, 18.2.8, and 19.2.7, a heap overflow allows a malicious client to corrupt the director's memory via oversized digest strings sent during initialization of a verify job. Disabling verify jobs mitigates the problem. This issue is also patched in Bareos versions 19.2.8, 18.2.9 and 17.2.10.
